emp_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT emp_no AS no, emp_name AS name, emp_tel AS tel, emp_email AS email, emp_salary AS salary, emp_hired_date AS hiredDate, dept_no AS "dept.no"
FROM (SELECT emp_no, emp_name, emp_tel, emp_email, emp_salary, emp_hired_date, dept_no,
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY emp_no DESC) row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY emp_name ASC) row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY emp_salary DESC) row_num
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY emp_hired_date DESC) row_num
FROM shop_employees
emp_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
)
WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
